duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with clinical managers and engineers to gather and assess user requirements for design concepts.
Illustrate concepts using storyboards, process flows, and maps to transform abstract ideas into tangible visual representations.
Craft UI mockups and prototypes that showcase both workflow and aesthetics.
Identify and address UI/UX issues and make strategic layout adjustments based on clinical feedback to enhance user experience.
Incorporate the latest design elements into work based on recent studies and findings, ensuring each UI/UX experience is informed by best practices.
Bring life to designs with a keen eye for aesthetics, transforming them from concepts into captivating realities that resonate with users.
